org.mellowtech.core.util

Class ArrayUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mellowtech.core.util.ArrayUtils

  • public final class ArrayUtils
extends Object
    A set of static methods to convert arrays to and from Strings and to increase/decrease the size of arrays.
    Author:
    rickard.coster@asimus.se, martin.svensson@asimus.se

        Parameters:

        separator - String that separates each number
        Returns:

      • setSize

        public static byte[] setSize(byte[] a,
                             int newSize)
        Increases or decreases the size of an array of bytes. If the new size is smaller only newSize elements will be copied.
        Parameters:
        a - the original array
        newSize - the size of the new array
        Returns:
        a new array with the original elements in a copied to it
